Class HuffmanMultiCharTuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • adp.aufgabe06.HuffmanMultiCharTuple

    public class HuffmanMultiCharTuple
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<HuffmanMultiCharTuple>
    A Huffman tuple consists of one or more characters and the amount of times they're present
